# Strata Developer Documentation

> Documentation for data engineers building semantic models with Strata CLI

Strata is a semantic layer platform that transforms raw database tables into business-ready analytics models. This documentation covers the Strata CLI used by data engineers to define semantic models using YAML files.

## Critical Concepts

**Unique Naming Principle**: Field names (dimensions and measures) must be unique across the entire semantic layer. This is a core design principle that enables unambiguous field references and is a key differentiator from other BI tools.

**No Many-to-Many Joins**: Strata does NOT support many-to-many relationships. Use junction/bridge tables with two separate relationships (one_to_many and many_to_one) instead.

**Git-Based Workflow**: All semantic models are version-controlled YAML files. This enables branching, code review, and CI/CD workflows â€” a major advantage over UI-based BI tools.

## Getting Started
- [What is Strata](/getting-started): Overview and concepts
- [Installation](/getting-started/installation): Install Strata CLI
- [Quickstart](/getting-started/quickstart): Create first model in 5 minutes
- [Core Concepts](/getting-started/concepts): Understanding the semantic layer
- [Tutorial](/getting-started/tutorial): Complete TPC-DS walkthrough

## CLI Commands
- [CLI Overview](/cli): Complete command reference
- [Projects](/cli/projects): Initialize and link projects
- [Datasources](/cli/datasources): Add, test, and manage database connections
- [Tables](/cli/tables): Create semantic table models
- [Relationships](/cli/relationships): Create join definitions
- [Migrations](/cli/migrations): Rename and swap operations
- [Tests](/cli/tests): Validate your semantic model
- [Audit](/cli/audit): Run validation checks
- [Deployment](/cli/deployment): Deploy to Strata server
- [CI/CD](/cli/ci-cd): Automated deployment workflows

## Semantic Model
- [Semantic Model Overview](/semantic-model): Deep dive into model capabilities
- [Tables](/semantic-model/tables): Table model reference (tbl.*.yml)
- [Datasources](/semantic-model/datasources): Configure database connections and tiers (hot/warm/cold)
- [Fields Overview](/semantic-model/fields): Dimensions and measures
- [Dimensions](/semantic-model/fields/dimensions): Categorical fields for grouping
- [Measures](/semantic-model/fields/measures): Aggregatable metrics
- [Compound Measures](/semantic-model/fields/measures/compound): Measures referencing other measures
- [Snapshot Measures](/semantic-model/fields/measures/snapshot): Point-in-time analysis
- [Data Types](/semantic-model/fields/data-types): string, integer, decimal, date, date_time, boolean, bigint, binary
- [Expressions](/semantic-model/expressions/sql): SQL expressions and [Field Name] references
- [Relationships](/semantic-model/relationships/cardinality): Join cardinality (many_to_one, one_to_many, one_to_one)
- [Join Types](/semantic-model/relationships/join-types): inner, left, right
- [Imports](/semantic-model/imports): Reuse field definitions across tables

## Database Adapters
- [Adapters Overview](/semantic-model/adapters): Supported databases
- [PostgreSQL](/semantic-model/adapters/postgres)
- [Snowflake](/semantic-model/adapters/snowflake)
- [MySQL](/semantic-model/adapters/mysql)
- [SQL Server](/semantic-model/adapters/sqlserver)
- [AWS Athena](/semantic-model/adapters/athena)
- [Trino](/semantic-model/adapters/trino)
- [DuckDB](/semantic-model/adapters/duckdb)
- [Apache Druid](/semantic-model/adapters/druid)

## Advanced Features
- [Exclusions](/advanced/exclusions): Filter-based measure exclusions
- [Inclusions](/advanced/inclusions): Multi-level calculations
- [Partitions](/advanced/partitions): Data availability constraints
- [Cost Optimization](/advanced/cost-optimization): Table cost and tier routing
- [Extended Blending](/advanced/extended-blending-groups): Blend dimensions across tables
- [Multi-Datasource](/advanced/multi-datasource): Cross-datasource queries
- [Temporal Decorators](/advanced/decorators/temporal): YoY, MoM comparisons
- [Window Decorators](/advanced/decorators/window): Moving averages, ranking
- [Contribution Decorators](/advanced/decorators/contribution): Percentage of total

## Examples
- [TPC-DS Tutorial](/getting-started/tutorial): Complete hands-on walkthrough
- [TPC-DS Deep Dive](/examples/tpcds-tutorial): Model patterns and lessons
- [Star Schema](/examples/patterns/star-schema): Star schema modeling
- [Snowflake Schema](/examples/patterns/snowflake-schema): Snowflake schema modeling
- [Fact-Dimension](/examples/patterns/fact-dimension): Fact-dimension patterns
- [Customer 360](/examples/recipes/customer-360): Customer analytics recipe
- [Sales Analysis](/examples/recipes/sales-analysis): Sales analytics recipe

## API
- [API Overview](/api): Machine-readable documentation for AI agents
- [LLM Integration](/api/llm-integration): Hierarchical JSON API for LLM navigation
- [JSON Schema](/api/json-schema): Schema definitions for YAML validation

## JSON API Endpoints (for LLMs)
- `/api/docs.json` - Root documentation index
- `/api/docs/cli.json` - CLI commands reference
- `/api/docs/semantic-model.json` - Semantic model reference
- `/api/schema/table.json` - Table YAML schema
- `/api/schema/relation.json` - Relation YAML schema
- `/api/cli/commands.json` - All CLI commands with flags
